channel.title: wordpress on Yoichi Kawasaki

item.title: Moving to Jekyll based Github page
item.description: Iâ€™ve moved my blog site from Wordpress to Jekyll based Github page. There are a few reasons for this: I wanted to manage my blog data on Github I wanted to switch from HTML based to Markdown I wanted more static approach like generating once, not dynamically rendering for every request (for performance reason) After a few minutes of googling, I came up with Jekyll and found it much easier to manage my blog data with Jekyll than with Wordpress.
